DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Activity 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their level of activity in the past seven days, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Activity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._A question about a person's most important health issues._The most recent week, including today._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ObjectClass.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Concepts.longName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Property.preferredName: Most Important Issue Past Week Activity
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's most important health issues.:The most recent week, including today.:An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Concepts.definition: A question about a person's most important health issues.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: UWQoLv4:University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Rogers S.N., and Lowe D., Version 4, 1999
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of five responses from active as ever to beddridden and housebound.

PermissibleValues.value: I am usually in bed or chair and don't leave home.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Usually in Bed or Chair and Don't Leave Home

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Usually in Bed or Chair and Don't Leave Home
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual does not go out and is usually in bed or a chair.

Concepts.longName: Usually in Bed or Chair and Don't Leave Home
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual does not go out and is usually in bed or a chair.

PermissibleValues.value: I don't go out because I don't have the strength.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Don't Go Out Because of Lack of Strength

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Don't Go Out Because of Lack of Strength
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual does not go out due to a lack of strength.

Concepts.longName: Don't Go Out Because of Lack of Strength
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual does not go out due to a lack of strength.

PermissibleValues.value: I am often tired and have slowed down my activities although I still get out.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Often Tired and Have Slowed Down Activities But Still Get Out

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Often Tired and Have Slowed Down Activities But Still Get Out
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is often tired and has slowed down, but still gets out.

Concepts.longName: Often Tired and Have Slowed Down Activities But Still Get Out
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is often tired and has slowed down, but still gets out.

PermissibleValues.value: There are times when I can't keep up my old pace, but not often.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: At Times Can't Keep Up With Usual Pace

ValueMeaning.preferredName: At Times Can't Keep Up With Usual Pace
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual cannot keep up their old pace, but that this is not often.

Concepts.longName: At Times Can't Keep Up With Usual Pace
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual cannot keep up their old pace, but that this is not often.

PermissibleValues.value: I am as active as I have ever been.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: As Active as Have Ever Been

ValueMeaning.preferredName: As Active as Have Ever Been
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is as active as ever.

Concepts.longName: As Active as Have Ever Been
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is as active as ever.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14
